text: Shanyder Borgelin (born October 19, 2001) is an American-born-Haitian soccer player who plays for Philadelphia Union II in the USL Championship. == Career == Borgelin appeared as an amateur player for USL Championship side Bethlehem Steel FC during their 2019 season after joining the Philadelphia Union academy in 2017.https://www.uslchampionship.com/shanyder- borgelinhttp://phil.ussoccerda.com/sam/teams/index.php?team=3941960&player;=273844671 == References == == External links == * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:American sportspeople of Haitian descent Category:Association football forwards Category:Philadelphia Union II players Category:Haiti youth international footballers Category:Haitian footballers Category:People from Broward County, Florida Category:Soccer players from Florida Category:Sportspeople from the Miami metropolitan area Category:USL Championship players
title: Shanyder Borgelin
